name: White Chocolate Bread Pudding
description: This buttery, rich white chocolate bread pudding is doused in a luscious white chocolate sauce
recipeIngredient: 9 ounces bread (croissant or French bread), cut into 1-inch cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Grease 8-inch square pan with butter; set aside. Adjust oven rack to middle position and preheat oven to 350°F. Spread bread cubes onto rimmed baking sheet and bake until edges of bread feels dry, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let pan cool on wire rack.

In medium saucepan whisk milk, cream, and sugar to combine. Heat over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until scalding. Remove from heat and whisk in chocolate until melted and smooth. Let sit to cool slightly, about 10 minutes.
In large bowl, whisk egg yolks and egg to combine. Slowly whisk in warm milk mixture to combine. Whisk in vanilla. Add bread cubes and let soak, about 30 minutes, gently stirring occasionally.
Pour mixture into prepared pan and bake until just set, about 25 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving, about 15 minutes.
To make the sauce: In small saucepan over medium heat, heat cream to just simmering. Remove from heat and whisk in chocolate until melted and smooth. Serve immediately.
